prompts.prompt: Implement a function that takes a story ID as input and retrieves all associated comments using the Hacker News Firebase API. Display comments in a structured format, including the author, comment text, and time posted in a paginated way. Ensure nested comments are properly formatted for readability.
prompts.issue_comment: The issue can be found on page 4.
prompts.comment: There is an issue regarding rendering special characters in the comments on model A.

prompts.prompt: Please add functionality to navigate to the previous and next pages.
prompts.issue_comment: The issue can be found on page 4.
prompts.comment: There is an issue regarding rendering special characters in the comments on model A.

prompts.prompt: Even though a story has many comments under it only the first few pages are visible. All the pages afterward are empty.
prompts.issue_comment: The issue can be found on page 4.
prompts.comment: There is an issue regarding rendering special characters in the comments on model A.
